config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  readonly targets=("${(f)target_path[@]}")
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  readonly targets=("${@}")
else
  echo 'Either a valid input or configuration is required' >&2
  exit 1
fi

../.common/finder-comment set "${finder_comment}" "${targets[@]}"
taskDescription: Sets the Finder comment of the passed-in path
